articles.author: Vivek Punj
articles.title: Investors Continue To Flock To Small-Cap Funds In July: AMFI Data - BQ Prime
articles.description: Investors continued to be attracted to small-cap funds, which accounted for 54.7% of the net equity fund inflows.
articles.content: Small-cap funds saw inflows of Rs 4,171.4 crore in July, compared with Rs 5,472 crore in June. Large-cap schemes saw outflows of Rs 1,880 crore last month, compared to outflows of Rs 2,050 crore in J… [+297 chars]

The Indian rupee on August 9 opened almost unchanged against the US dollar a day ahead of key Reserve Bank of India's bi-monthly policy review outcome and release of US inflation data.
